FuncDef: The display vrrp command displays the status and parameters of a VRRP group. The display vrrp command displays the status and parameters of a VRRP group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name, type, and ID of an interface.
-

Specifies the ID of a VRRP group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Displays detailed information about the current VRRP group.
-

ExtraInfo: The display vrrp command displays information about VRRP groups.
